question: How can I make a traditional Moroccan tagine and generate an image of a tagine dish?

steps.content: How can I make a traditional Moroccan tagine and generate an image of a tagine dish?
Plan: 1) Search for a traditional Moroccan tagine recipe. 2) Generate an image of a tagine dish. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for a traditional Moroccan tagine recipe.

Traditional Moroccan tagine recipe: 1 kg lamb, 2 tbsp olive oil, 2 onions, 3 garlic cloves, 1 tsp ground ginger, 1 tsp ground cumin, 1 tsp ground cinnamon, 1 tsp ground turmeric, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp black pepper, 1 cup chicken broth, 1 cup dried apricots, 1 cup chickpeas, 1/2 cup almonds, salt to taste.
Generating an image of a Moroccan tagine dish.
Image of a tagine dish generated.
What is the traditional cooking method for tagine?
Plan: 1) Search for the traditional cooking method for tagine. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for the traditional cooking method for tagine.
Traditional tagine is cooked slowly in a conical clay pot over low heat, allowing the flavors to meld together.

Traditional Moroccan tagine recipe: 1 kg lamb, 2 tbsp olive oil, 2 onions, 3 garlic cloves, 1 tsp ground ginger, 1 tsp ground cumin, 1 tsp ground cinnamon, 1 tsp ground turmeric, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp black pepper, 1 cup chicken broth, 1 cup dried apricots, 1 cup chickpeas, 1/2 cup almonds, salt to taste.
